MARK 12.23 in þizai usstassai, þan usstandand, ƕarjamma ize wairþiþ qens?
þai auk sibun aihtedun þo du qenai.
MARK 12.24 jah andhafjands Iesus qaþ du im:
niu duþe airzjai sijuþ, ni kunnandans mela nih maht gudis?
MARK 12.25 allis þan usstandand us dauþaim, ni liugand ni liuganda, ak sind swe aggiljus þai in himinam.
MARK 12.26 aþþan bi dauþans, þatei urreisand, niu gakunnaideduþ ana bokom Mosezis ana aiƕatundjai, ƕaiwa imma qaþ guþ qiþands:
ik im guþ Abrahamis jah guþ Isakis jah guþ Iakobis?
MARK 12.27 nist guþ dauþaize, ak qiwaize.
aþþan jus filu airzjai sijuþ.
MARK 12.28 jah duatgaggands ains þize bokarje, gahausjands ins samana sokjandans, gasaiƕands þatei waila im andhof, frah ina:
ƕarja ist allaizo anabusne frumista?
MARK 12.29 iþ Iesus andhof imma þatei frumista allaizo anabusns:
hausei, Israel,
frauja guþ unsar frauja ains ist.
MARK 12.30 jah frijos fraujan guþ þeinana us allamma hairtin þeinamma jah us allai saiwalai þeinai jah us allai gahugdai þeinai jah us allai mahtai þeinai.
so frumista anabusns.
MARK 12.31 jah anþara galeika þizai:
frijos neƕundjan þeinana swe þuk silban.
Maizei þaim anþara anabusns nist.
MARK 12.32 jah qaþ du imma sa bokareis:
waila, laisari, bi sunjai qast þatei ains ist, jah nist anþar alja imma;

MARK 12.33 jah þata du frijon ina us allamma hairtin jah us allamma fraþja jah us allai saiwalai jah us allai mahtai, jah þata du frijon neƕundjan swe sik silban managizo ist allaim þaim alabrunstim jah saudim.
MARK 12.34 jah Iesus gasaiƕands ina þatei frodaba andhof, qaþ du imma:
ni fairra is þiudangardjai gudis.
jah ainshun þanaseiþs ni gadaursta ina fraihnan.
MARK 12.35 jah andhafjands Iesus qaþ laisjands in alh:
ƕaiwa qiþand þai bokarjos þatei Xristus sunus ist Daweidis?
MARK 12.36 silba auk Daweid qaþ in ahmin weihamma:
qiþiþ frauja du fraujin meinamma,
sit af taihswon meinai, unte ik galagja fijands þeinans fotubaurd fotiwe þeinaize.
MARK 12.37 silba raihtis Daweid qiþiþ ina fraujan, jah ƕaþro imma sunus ist?
jah alla so managei hausidedun imma gabaurjaba.
MARK 12.38 jah qaþ du im in laiseinai seinai:
saiƕiþ faura bokarjam...
...MARK 13.16 wastja seina.
MARK 13.17 aþþan wai þaim qiþuhaftom jah daddjandeim in jainaim dagam.
MARK 13.18 aþþan bidjaiþ ei ni wairþai sa þlauhs izwar wintrau.
MARK 13.19 wairþand auk þai dagos jainai aglo swaleika, swe ni was swaleika fram anastodeinai gaskaftais þoei gaskop guþ, und hita, jah ni wairþiþ.
MARK 13.20 jah ni frauja gamaurgidedi þans dagans, ni þauh ganesi ainhun leike;
akei in þize gawalidane, þanzei gawalida, gamaurgida þans dagans.
MARK 13.21 jah þan jabai ƕas izwis qiþai: sai, her Xristus, aiþþau sai, jainar, ni galaubjaiþ;
MARK 13.22 unte urreisand galiugaxristjus jah galiugapraufeteis jah giband taiknins jah fauratanja du afairzjan, jabai mahteig sijai, jah þans gawalidans.
MARK 13.23 iþ jus saiƕiþ:
sai, fauragataih izwis allata.
MARK 13.24 akei in jainans dagans afar þo aglon jaina sauil riqizeiþ jah mena ni gibiþ liuhaþ sein.
MARK 13.25 jah stairnons himinis wairþand driusandeins jah mahteis þos in himinam gawagjanda.
MARK 13.26 jah þan gasaiƕand sunu mans qimandan in milhmam miþ mahtai managai jah wulþau.
MARK 13.27 jah þan insandeiþ aggiluns seinans jah galisiþ þans gawalidans seinans af fidwor windam fram andjam airþos und andi himinis.
MARK 13.28 aþþan af smakkabagma ganimiþ þo gajukon.
þan þis juþan asts þlaqus wairþiþ, jah uskeinand laubos, kunnuþ þatei neƕa ist asans.
MARK 13.29 swah jah jus, þan gasaiƕiþ þata wairþan, kunneiþ þatei neƕa sijuþ at...
...MARK 14.4 _teins þis balsanis warþ?
MARK 14.5 maht wesi auk þata balsan frabugjan in managizo þau þrija hunda skatte jah giban unledaim.
